name: Peanut Butter Stuffed Jalapenos
author: TOM TROTTIER
summary: This is my rendition of the hottest appetizer in Baja. It's a great appetizer that takes the heat out of the peppers. In fact, I had an 80-year-old lady eat one and say, 'Oh my, this is the first time I have been able to eat a whole jalapeno.'
ingredients: 7  fresh jalapeno peppers, stems removed and seeded
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Fill the cavities of the peppers with peanut butter
Line up the peppers side by side on a sheet of aluminum foil, and wrap tightly
Bake in the preheated oven about 20 minutes
